text: @realDonaldTrump Your so called “presidency” is the fake news.  U would not be sitting in #WhiteHouse wout #Putin interference. You have done everything imaginable to hurt US democracy- following  #Putin order.  U deliberately failed to respond to warnings #coronavirus + still still fail to act.
